system.description:
Also at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with attacks made with acid flasks, alchemist's fire, and flash bombs. Furthermore, each of these is more potent if crafted by you.

Acid Flask: Your acid flasks deal an immediate 2d4 acid damage on hit. The initial damage increases by 1d4 at levels 7, 10, 14, and 18. At level 14 the ongoing damage also increases to 3d4 per tick.

Alchemist's Fire: Your alchemist's fire deals an immediate 1d6 fire damage on hit. This initial damage increases by 1d6 at levels 7, 10, 14, and 18.

Flash Bomb: You may use your scholar DC in place of the DC of the bomb if it is higher.
